column2: <START> Maison Hubbel could become a kindergarten teacher after the Olympics Im one and thats exactly what I thought how I would explain
<START> The art of telling your story through competitive dancing skating on ice This is how I view figure skating
<START> The background Musik is too loud and disturbing
<START> Madison gave it her best shotShes so earnest

<START> There are also humans who enjoy watching other humans skate They clap their hands and throw plushies and flowers at the end of the performances They also shout and wave pieces of cloth that represent the different regions of the planet
<START> the way Madison Hubbel explained it made us humans seem nuts lol
<START> should ask chock and bates abt that
